contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailPreviewText: Check out the latest news 📰 from the Kentico community!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailSubject: Lessons learned deploying to SaaS, AI tools and security, and Xperience's April Refresh
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailIntroContentHTML:
Hey {!ResolveDynamicText("Recipient.FirstName","friend")!},

It's been a few weeks since our last Kentico Community Newsletter which means we have a lot of news, articles, and community contributions to catch up on.

The Kentico MVPs have been busy covering a variety of topics around Xperience by Kentico, like upgrades and SaaS, and the digital experience space in general.

Are you interested in the evolving world of LLMs, transformer models, and AI? We wrote 2 blog posts about using AI when building Xperience by Kentico projects to help you be more productive while also staying secure.

We also reviewed April's Refresh, which brought several new, cool features ready for marketers and developers to use today and a few in preview - like digital commerce!

Enjoy!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailOutroContentHTML:
Are you interested in finding previous contributions from the Kentico community that we feature here? Check out the Community contributions page over on the Kentico Community Portal. You can also share 🤗 your own contributions so we can feature them in an upcoming newsletter 🙌.

Did you find the information in this newsletter helpful, does something looks strange in your email client, or do you have news, a video, or blog post to feature in a future newsletter - let us know by giving us some feedback.
